author: Rebecca Falconer
title: Hundreds arrested at anti-war protests in Russia and Belarus
description: More than 5,200 Russians have been detained since Putin ordered the invasion of Ukraine last Thursday, monitoring groups say.
content: Police in Russia arrested over 2,000 people protesting the invasion of Ukraine and authorities in Belarus detained more than 400 others in massive crackdowns on the anti-war movement in the countriesâ€¦ [+424 chars]
